Question: This person made seven flights in the X-15 from November 1960 to July 1962.
Hints: This person graduated in 1955 with a bachelor's degree in aeronautical engineering.
This person and the group spent the rest of the night drinking scotch and discussing what had happened.
This person was born on August 5, 1930, in Wapakoneta, Ohio, to Stephen Koenig **** and Viola Louise Engel.
